channel.title: 317 delta help
channel.description:
Well i am trying to add animated god wars bosses i have the models and i put them where they belong and i added the class 5 ints but when i compile and go into the game and try to spawn a gradoor i get an oger.
When i looked on my auto spawn i found that the code 1115 is for my bandos (my unanimated model which i see at my ::bandos teleport) but when i do ::npc1115 i get an ogre even though bandos is using that same id.
How can i fix this? Thanks!

item.title: 317 delta help
item.dc:creator: @Embold Embold
item.description:
@Embold wrote:

Apperantly the other models arent the legit models can anyone send me 317 models for arma zammy and saradomin boss?

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: 317 delta help
item.description:
@411 wrote:

well… the id for an ogre is 115, and you said that you did ::npc1115… you need to make sure you put in a space after ::npc

it should look like this, ::npc 1115

hope this helps

Read full topic
